8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: What should I do about "File Update Failed" alerts on a site? I frequently see this on ZeroMail, for example.

> [nofish](#comment_906_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): It happens when one of the user's files does not distributes correctly. (usually because of unstable network connection)

Do you mean one of my files isn't distributing, or another user's file?
